title: koDu bEga
sahitya:
koDu bEga divyamati sarasvati koDu bEga divyamati


anupallavi

  makuT hari hayamukharoDeyaLe ninnaya aDigaLigeraguva amma brahmana rANi


caraNam 1    indirA ramaNana hariya soseyu nInu bandenna vadanadi nindu nAmava nuDise
    caraNam 2    agiLa vidhyAbhimAni ajana paTTada rANi sukhavittu pAlise sujana shirOmaNi
    caraNam 3    patita pAvaneya nI gatiyendu nambide vitata puradara viTTalana tOre
